mapper.update:
update B_H_032
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHRBMID = #{whrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

JZ = #{jz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JZBZ = #{jzbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_032 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WHRBMID = #{whrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCH = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CB = #{cb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CBBZ = #{cbbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZ = #{jz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JZBZ = #{jzbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_032 set WHSJ = sysdate, WHRBMID = #{whrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CB = #{cb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CBBZ = #{cbbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZ = #{jz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JZBZ = #{jzbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nvl(XLH, '-') = nvl(#{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '-') and nvl(PCH, '-') = nvl(#{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '-') and DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
